```{r}
fitControl <- trainControl(method = "repeatedcv",
                           number = 3,
                           repeats = 1,
                           savePredictions = TRUE
                          )

train_model <- function(data, method){

  model <- train(data %>% dplyr::select(-TARGET,-CONTRACT_KEY), (data %>% dplyr::select(TARGET))[,1], method=method, trControl = fitControl)
}

predict_and_create_submission <- function(model, test_data){
  
  test_data_without_contract_key <- test_data %>% select(-CONTRACT_KEY)
  CONTRACT_KEYS <- test_data %>% dplyr::select(CONTRACT_KEY)
  predictions <- predict(model, test_data_without_contract_key)
  
  submission <- data.frame(
    CONTRACT_KEY = CONTRACT_KEYS,
    PREDICTED_TARGET = predictions
  )
  
  write.csv(submission,quote=FALSE,row.names=FALSE, file= paste("submissions/", Sys.time(), ".csv", sep=""))
  
  return(submission)
}
```

```{r}
prepare_dataset <- function(data) {
  ret_data <- inner_join(data, contract_data, by="CONTRACT_KEY") 
  
  ret_data <- ret_data %>% dplyr::select(-HANDSET_NAME,-RATE_PLAN, -X)
  
  ret_dummy <- dummyVars("~.", data=ret_data, fullRank=F)
  ret_data <- as.data.frame(predict(ret_dummy, ret_data))
  
  ret_data <- ret_data %>% mutate(USAGE_DIFF=X210_USAGE-X206_USAGE)
  
  if("TARGET.1" %in% names(ret_data)){
    ret_data <- ret_data %>% mutate(TARGET=as.factor(TARGET.1)) %>% dplyr::select(-TARGET.1,-TARGET.0)
  }
  
  return(ret_data)
}

train_transformed_data <- prepare_dataset(train_data)
test_transformed_data <- prepare_dataset(test_data)

train_transformed_data %>%str
```
